root: ^Good day fellow adventurer! I am Sir Quacks-A-Lot (*quack*). How may I help you on this lovely day?

intro: ^Can you tell me about this "evil duck"?
^May I pass you and go on the bridge?

c-0: ^I am the protector of this bridge!
c-2: ^It is a sign of my spotless (*quack*) reputation! I wear it for honor, glory, and God!
c-3: ^Absolutely not (*quack*), unless you fight me! Otherwise, you shall be utterly disgraced. Though, you do not seem very strong (*quack*) or the fighting type, so I challenge you to a battle of wits!

evilDuckMentioned: ^I have been on a wild duck (*quack*) chase in search of the evil, murderous, duck! But alas, I cannot find them, and because of this, I have not slept one wink (*quack*), in a fortnight!
^Is there any way I can help you?

c-0: ^Alas, no there is no way you can help me. Even if I needed the help, I could subject a fair citizen such as you to the horrors of the evil duck.
^I am bored however, so I challenge you to a battle of wits!

question1: ^What goes up but never comes down? (*quack*)
question2: ^Correct! Onto the second (*quack*) question. The more you take, the more you leave behind. What are they?
question3: ^Correct! Onto the last question. I have branches (*quack*), but no fruit, trunk or leaves. What am I?
win: ^Correct! (*quack*) Thank you for accepting my challenge to a battle of wits (*quack*). I will now allow you to pass through this bridge whenever you wish.
